tool_description: A fully managed tournament Engine that comes with rich features to organize bespoke esports competitions on demand.
title: Esport Tournament Engine

api_list.name: Remove a participant
api_list.description: Delete a participant from a tournament

body.message: Participant with id 62fc4ae56010f469060d45a6 was deleted successfully

api_list.name: Create new tournament
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://esport-tournament-engine.p.rapidapi.com/createNewTournament"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "esport-tournament-engine.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Retrieve leaderboard
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://esport-tournament-engine.p.rapidapi.com/getTournamentRankings/{tournamentid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "esport-tournament-engine.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

body.message: Here is the ranking for this tournament

api_list.name: Retrieve multiple tournaments
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://esport-tournament-engine.p.rapidapi.com/getTournaments"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "esport-tournament-engine.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Retrieve participant's upcoming matches
api_list.description: Retrieve upcoming fixtures of a specific participant

body.message: The upcoming fixtures for the participant 62fbe896ed92d61a14ca690d

api_list.name: Retrieve a tournament
api_list.description: Retrieve a tournament by its ID

api_list.name: Delete tournament
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://esport-tournament-engine.p.rapidapi.com/deletetournament/{tournamentid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "esport-tournament-engine.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.delete(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Copy tournament
api_list.description: Create a new instance of a previous tournament.

api_list.name: Score report

response.message: The fixture has ended and the following participant advanced to the next fixture.

api_list.name: Add participant
api_list.description: Add a participant to the tournament
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://esport-tournament-engine.p.rapidapi.com/setInitialRoundParticipant/{tournamentid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "esport-tournament-engine.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Reschedule match
api_list.description: This endpoint enables you to reschedule a fixture

body.message: The fixture with id 62fbe872ed92d61a14ca6903 was successfully rescheduled.

api_list.name: CheckIn participant
api_list.description: CheckIn/Out a participant before a fixture.

api_list.name: Start tounament manually
api_list.description: This feature only applies to League, Two Stages and Free For All formats.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://esport-tournament-engine.p.rapidapi.com/startTournament/{tournamentid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "esport-tournament-engine.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Create new tournament

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "esport-tournament-engine.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
